channel.title: Hey i got some question about lunars and stuff
channel.description:
hey as many know i ask alot of questions but when i made this questions finished and got server open at port forwarding client is finished.
1. how to add lunars i got a lunar folder with alot of (idk what files)
2. can somone make me a ::explode code that works mine isnt working.
3. i got a blue gs but i want red green and like that in the class 8 u can change color right? but whats the color code for black, green, red, blue, dragon, green, rune, bronze, iron, steel, white, mith, addy, yellow, gold, silver, grey, and like that. and how to add like 2 colors like the gs handle is black and the blade is red?
4. i got some capes i got owner, admin, mod and donator but how do i make other ppls donator like owner is 3, admin is 2, mod is 1, normal is 0 but what is donator?
5. remember the capes i got some more to but they are weapons how to get the capes being capes instead off weapons?
6. i want wings black wings gold wings , red, blue, green and white can somone tell me where to find models and the class 8 code?
7.i have added a bandos cape but when i use the ::pickup 12345 1 i see bandos cape but then i get connect lost and cant log in b4 i have go into my character and removed the (ITEM = ITEMID 12345, 1) from my character then i can log in.
8. i need help with my ::bank command like when i use ::bank i can se my bank but then the starter stuff shows upp and then u get connect lost and after tht u type ::bank and get connect lost everytime i use ::bank.
9. how to add objects.
10. i need some commands please i know i have to make them myself some ppls say but idk how and i cant use any command maker. so i ask here.
i need ::getpass PLAYERNAME ::hp (for full hp for admin+) ::bank (a new one) ::cwars (go to castle wars) ::champion (owners only gets all stats 99 and all the others max like kbd kills 999m and stuff like that. ::dp (i need it i know i can just change item and code on ::dp so i just need ::dp. if i was a noob i needed ::dp1, ::dp2, until ::dp10)
11. omg i need a new godwars becuz when i tele ther i just get to the boss in the start and the iceroom wher saradomin wizard is. is there some ice giants wich is in a minigame which was coming with my source.
12. (last one) i need some a spec command like when somone type ::stafflist it pops up
owner: my name Co-owner: hes/shes name admin: admin name admin: admin name admin: admin name mod: mod name mod: mod name mod: mod name mod: mod name
thx and remember to numberize the questions ur answering on

item.title: Hey i got some question about lunars and stuff
item.dc:creator: @kneistol kneistol
item.description:
@kneistol wrote:

hey as many know i ask alot of questions but when i made this questions finished and got server open at port forwarding client is finished.

  1. how to add lunars i got a lunar folder with alot of (idk what files)

  2. can somone make me a ::explode code that works mine isnt working.

  3. i got a blue gs but i want red green and like that in the class 8 u can change color right? but whats the color code for
    black, green, red, blue, dragon, green, rune, bronze, iron, steel, white, mith, addy, yellow, gold, silver, grey, and like that.
    and how to add like 2 colors like the gs handle is black and the blade is red?

  4. i got some capes i got owner, admin, mod and donator but how do i make other ppls donator like owner is 3, admin is 2, mod is 1, normal is 0
    but what is donator?

  5. remember the capes i got some more to but they are weapons how to get the capes being capes instead off weapons?

  6. i want wings black wings gold wings , red, blue, green and white can somone tell me where to find models and the class 8 code?

7.i have added a bandos cape but when i use the ::pickup 12345 1 i see bandos cape but then i get connect lost and cant log in b4 i have go into my character and removed the (ITEM = ITEMID 12345, 1) from my character then i can log in.

  1. i need help with my ::bank command like when i use ::bank i can se my bank but then the starter stuff shows upp and then u get connect lost and after tht u type ::bank and get connect lost everytime i use ::bank.

  2. how to add objects.

  3. i need some commands please i know i have to make them myself some ppls say but idk how and i cant use any command maker.
    so i ask here.

i need
::getpass PLAYERNAME
::hp (for full hp for admin+)
::bank (a new one)
::cwars (go to castle wars)
::champion (owners only gets all stats 99 and all the others max like kbd kills 999m and stuff like that.
::dp (i need it i know i can just change item and code on ::dp so i just need ::dp. if i was a noob i needed ::dp1, ::dp2, until ::dp10)

  1. omg i need a new godwars becuz when i tele ther i just get to the boss in the start and the iceroom wher saradomin wizard is. is there some ice giants wich is in a minigame which was coming with my source.

  2. (last one) i need some a spec command like when somone type ::stafflist it pops up

owner: my name
Co-owner: hes/shes name
admin: admin name
admin: admin name
admin: admin name
mod: mod name
mod: mod name
mod: mod name
mod: mod name

thx and remember to numberize the questions ur answering on

Read full topic
